Key Match Events: Alex Verdugo hit a go-ahead single in the seventh inning
Gleyber Torres and MJ Melendez hit two-run homers
Kansas City pitchers tied their season high with eight walks, forcing in a pair of runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first postseason game with five lead changes
Juan Soto went 3 for 5 and threw out Salvador Perez in the second inning trying to score from second on Melendezâ€™s single to right
Four Yankees relievers combined to allow only an unearned run over four innings
Others: The series between the AL-best Yankees and wild-card Royals resumes Monday night
These teams met in four playoffs from 1976-80, with the Yankees winning the first three and getting swept in the last
